name: Bias Modification
description: Bias Modification is a game making you happier and it is backed with scientific research.  An optional premium upgrade is available through a one-time in-app purchase that will remove ads, allow to view your progress and play longer than one minute rounds.  To get bugs fixed as fast as possible, please use the FEEDBACK button in the games HELP screen. The more (and precise) information you provide for reproducing the bug, the faster it will be fixed.  WHAT IS COGNITIVE BIAS MODIFICATION Cognitive bias modification (CBM) has been shown to help overcome the tendency to focus on negative or threatening social cues. CBM does this by making you repeatedly select positive over negative information.  FEATURES - Familiar match-three gameplay - Test you improvement - View test results (included in the Premium upgrade)
